subject: Golf
Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
lead_paragraph: Ryo Ishikawa, 19, said he would donate all of his tournament earnings this year — and a bonus for every birdie he makes — toward relief efforts in his native Japan.
snippet: Ryo Ishikawa, 19, said he would donate all of his tournament earnings this year — and a bonus for every birdie he makes — toward relief efforts in his native Japan.
